channel.title: Party hat (and halloween masks too) question
channel.description:
IDk if anyone of u smart moparscape users have any tuts on this but if not maybe it could b a kewl thing to do if not oh well but if any of u can this would b great......anyway my question was is there any way to make Party hats (h'ween masks too) randomly switch colors while they are in ur inventory?
IF you know of any tuts or you want to help me make or just make it for me that would be great thx!!![br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2007, 10:02:54 PM[/size][hr]If anyone actually reads this today besides me ill be playing final fantasy 3 so if I dont answer right away just wait a few wminutes I come and check every few minutes

item.title: Party hat (and halloween masks too) question
item.dc:creator: @aceeca aceeca
item.description:
@aceeca wrote:

ok thx, but just to make sure I mean like u dont have to click anything like a command or something to make phat or h’ween masks alternate back and fourth between colors just something so it looks kewl lol
